channel.title: InDEA on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in InDEA on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: A flawed idea of InDEA!
item.description: IFF submitted comments in the ongoing consultation for India Digital Ecosystem Architecture (InDEA) 2.0 released by the MeitY in January 2022. Our core approach is towards ensuring that the rollout of the architecture happens in a manner that safeguards the rights of the user.
